algorithm_technique: Direct implementation of conditional logic based on dimensions and mass.
problem_summary_simple: Categorize a box as Bulky, Heavy, Both, or Neither based on its dimensions and mass.
problem_summary_technical: Apply conditional logic to determine box category based on dimension thresholds and volume, and mass threshold.
key_insights: The problem involves straightforward application of given rules.
Careful handling of large numbers for volume calculation is important.
The second solution uses a clever indexing trick to map boolean conditions to category strings.
